about.description: Hi, I'm Camille and I'm a Digital Marketing & Content Specialist based in East London.

contact.description: Do you want to have a chat or just say hello? Send me an email at the address below:

cards.title: this is the title for cards

cardsList.title: Web audit
cardsList.description: Full audit of your website and identification of  indexing, crawlability or usability issues that could prevent search engines from indexing your site or offer a poor user experience.

cardsList.title: SEO optimisation
cardsList.description: Actionable recommendations to improve your SEO strategy, organic rankings and increase the amount of relevant traffic to your website.

cardsList.title: Content marketing
cardsList.description: Analysing the search landscape for your product and business, identifying  techniques used by your competitors and opportunities to increase your visibility through content gap analysis.
